article: Mr Smith is 35 years old.He _ in a food store .Every day he gets up at 6:30 in the morning and brushes _ teeth.He eats breakfast at 7:00.After breakfast,he _ his son,Jack to school.And then he takes the number 11 bus _ work.After he gets off the bus,he needs to _ to the store.He thinks it can help him to be _ .His work starts at 8:30 and he gets _ at 6:00 p.m.At 6:15,he has _ .Then he watches TV and helps Jack do his homework.He goes to bed at 11:00.
